channel.title: Dylan Phone Server on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Dylan Phone Server on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Airport waiting
item.description: I am sitting here io the buffalo airport waiting for dylans flight to arrive. I am posting this with opera for my phone. Pretty awesome. I need to find a terminal so I can do some quick management of my server . Well I can on longer see the text I an typing. Which is really dangerous when using t9 for input.
